com.pureperfect.ferret.vfs.PathElement

Packages that use PathElement
com.pureperfect.ferret Ferret class path scanning API. 
com.pureperfect.ferret.vfs A lightweight Virtual File System (VFS) for file system / network / class path scanning.

Uses of PathElement in com.pureperfect.ferret.vfs
 

Subinterfaces of PathElement in com.pureperfect.ferret.vfs
 interface Archive
          Represents an archive on the virtual file system; usually a JAR or ZIP file.
 interface ArchiveEntry
          Represents an entry in an archive on the virtual file system.
 interface ClassFile
          A Java class file.
 interface Container
          A container is a PathElement that contains other PathElements.
 interface Directory
          Represents a directory on the virtual file system.
 interface File
          Represents a file on the virtual file system.
 interface WebDirectory
          A directory in a web application (WAR).
 interface WebFile
          A file in a web application (WAR File).
